text: About Time is a romantic drama movie. It is about a man, played by Domhnall Gleeson, who can time travel. It is set in Cornwall and London. Rachel McAdams plays Mary, and Margot Robbie plays Charlotte. The movie was rated R by MPAA mostly for profanity. About Time was released in the United Kingdom on September 4, 2013 and the United States on November 1, 2013. Category:2013 romantic drama movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:Cornwall Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies set in London Category:Time travel movies
title: About Time (movie)
